text_block_list.text: Sakura Laurel and I were heading to the course to start with her training when――

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: In any case, I'm going to make the announcement……! And you can proceed with installing the machine!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: You two, what's wrong? Did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I see, so a mistake was made with the order. And the machines were supposed to be unveiled today?

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Yes……we announced that 5 would be installed but only 1 made it…… Everyone came to see them, but how should I explain it……?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Did you ask the President?

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: The President and Vice President are dealing with another matter today so I can't contact them. Today was supposed to be a special event too, and now it'll go to waste――!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Why's that? Even with just one machine it should be plenty of fun!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Because, aren't there plenty of ways to make it more fun!? For example, let's see――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: How about turning it in to a record keeping event? How does that sound?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Comparing your current numbers against others can help you get a clear picture of your current situation and makes it easier to set goals! And it will let everyone try out the machine!
With her positive attitude and flexible thinking……I couldn't help but agree. To help with her idea, right now I should――

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: B-but will everyone agree with that……?
choice_data_list: I can help with that! Let's do it!
I can help with that! Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――! Fufu, if Trainer-san is helping, then there's nothing to worry about!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: See? It'll be fine! Let's make this a great event!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eeeh, there's only one machine!?
choice_data_list: That's why we're doing record keeping!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I see……but, the girl I'm responsible for hasn't debuted yet, so to make her compete against already experienced girls is……
choice_data_list: We're going to divide it based on grade!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: I see…… In that case, well……
I move about frantically trying to talk to everyone involved. I was desperate to make sure Sakura Laurel's idea worked out.
――With all the preparations completed, the training event began!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――Well then, the record keeping for the new machine, the Tire Flip is beginning~! We'll start with the senior class girls! I'll count how many times you can do it in one minute!

text_block_list.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll go first! I'll do it~~!!

text_block_list.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Hmmph! ――Doriyaah! Guu-……aaah!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――5, 4, 3, 2, 1, that's it! Your count is……Ooooh, 22 times!

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Amazing……it really did become 『Fun』…… everyone seems motivated……

text_block_list.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Um, I hope this event will be held again! It's really interesting and invigorating!

text_block_list.name: Student Council Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: O-……Okay! The student council will consider it!
The event was a great success. Everyone seemed to be able to get valuable data, a few of the trainers thanked me for this opportunity too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Looks like it'll all wrap up without issue, Trainer-san! Thank you very much for helping arrange things……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: And, I'm sorry! For acting on my own and causing trouble for you.
choice_data_list: No, I'm glad I could help you
No, I'm glad I could help you

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Of course! Because Trainer-san worked so hard, everything went well!
choice_data_list: It's because of your positive attitude
It's because of your positive attitude

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――……Fufu. Then, I guess that means it was both of us together♪
After that, Sakura Laurel also participated―― making it a fulfilling training session.
